metadata.title: Balearic Yacht Charters - Luxury Yacht Charter
metadata.description: Experience the ultimate luxury yacht charter in the Balearic Islands.

hero.title: Your Private Mediterranean Escape
hero.subtitle: Premium yacht charters in the Balearic Islands. Tailored luxury, professional crew, and unforgettable horizons.
hero.seasonLaunch: 2026 Season Launch: Book before February 28, 2026 and save 10% on all charters!

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: Get in touch to plan your perfect journey.
contact.successMessage: We have received your request and will get back to you shortly.
contact.errorRetryMessage: Please try again or contact us directly.

fleet.title: Our Luxury Fleet
fleet.subtitle: Discover our collection of world-class yachts
fleet.quoteFormDescription: Fill out the form below to receive a personalized offer.
fleet.ctaTitle: Ready to book your dream vacation?
fleet.ctaDescription: Contact us today to secure your dates.
fleet.lookingForClassicSailing: Looking for a classic sailing experience?
fleet.experienceCharmClassic: Experience the charm of our classic yacht with excellent value for money.

simona.headline: The Essence of Luxury Catamaran Sailing
simona.description: This well-maintained Lagoon 400 S2 combines reliability with style for unforgettable sailing experiences. It offers a spacious layout and modern amenities, making it ideal for exploring the Balearic Islands.
simona.tagline: SIMONA is the perfect choice for those seeking comfort and adventure.

wide-dream.headline: Classic Comfort & Reliability
wide-dream.description: Wide Dream (Lagoon 400 S2) is the perfect choice for those who value practical luxury. Compact yet incredibly spacious, she offers everything needed for a memorable holiday at sea.

destinations.title: Exclusive Destinations
destinations.subtitle: Explore the Mediterranean's finest locations
destinations.readyToExploreDescription: Book your dream yacht charter today and discover the hidden gems of the Balearic Islands.
destinations.tideNote: Data based on local maritime stations.
destinations.happyGuestsDescription: Join hundreds of satisfied travelers who have explored the coast with us.
destinations.joinOurGuests: Join our community of sea lovers

ibiza.title: Ibiza
ibiza.description: Experience world-famous beach clubs and crystal-clear turquoise waters.

formentera.title: Formentera
formentera.description: Discover the Caribbean of the Mediterranean with pristine white sand beaches.

mallorca.title: Mallorca
mallorca.description: Explore hidden calas, dramatic mountains, and the vibrant culture of Palma.

menorca.title: Menorca
menorca.description: Enjoy the peaceful atmosphere and untouched natural beauty of this UNESCO Biosphere Reserve.

costa-blanca.title: Costa Blanca
costa-blanca.description: The sun-drenched Costa Blanca offers pristine beaches, vibrant marinas, and charming coastal towns along Spain's eastern coast.

culinary.title: Onboard Dining
culinary.subtitle: Exquisite tastes at sea
culinary.description: Enjoy meals prepared with fresh local ingredients.

paella.title: Authentic Paella
paella.description: Freshly cooked onboard using local seafood and traditional saffron recipes.

bbq.title: Premium BBQ & Steaks
bbq.description: High-quality cuts grilled to perfection on the open deck.

tapas.title: Local Tapas & Wines
tapas.description: A curated selection of Spanish cheeses, hams, and regional wines.

mediterranean.title: Mediterranean Cuisine
mediterranean.description: Fresh seafood, local produce, and Mediterranean flavors curated by our experienced culinary team.

sunset.title: Sunset Dining
sunset.description: A romantic dining experience as the sun sets over the Mediterranean, with gourmet dishes and fine wines.

reviews.title: What Our Guests Say
reviews.subtitle: Hear from those who have experienced the luxury of our charters
reviews.ourGuestsHaveLeft: Our guests have left {count} unforgettable stories
reviews.exploreGuestbook: Explore the Balearic Yacht Charters Guestbook

testimonials.title: Customer Testimonials
testimonials.subtitle: Real experiences from our valued guests

about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: Passion for the sea
about.mission: Our mission is to provide unforgettable experiences.
about.companyDescription: Balearic Yacht Charters is dedicated to providing the ultimate luxury yacht charter experience in the Balearic Islands. Our fleet is meticulously maintained and our crew is handpicked to ensure your safety and comfort.
about.areasDescription: We operate primarily in the stunning waters of Mallorca, Ibiza, and Formentera, offering you access to hidden coves and pristine beaches.
about.ctaDescription: Join us on board for the holiday of a lifetime.
about.metaDescription: Learn about Balearic Yacht Charters, our mission, and our luxury yacht charter services in Spain.

logistics.title: Expert Logistics
logistics.description: We handle every detail of your journey, from itinerary planning to provisioning, ensuring a stress-free experience.

crew.title: Professional Crew
crew.description: Our captains and hostesses are highly experienced, multilingual, and dedicated to your safety and enjoyment.

gourmet.title: Gourmet Experience
gourmet.description: Indulge in delicious local cuisine prepared onboard, tailored to your dietary preferences.

beginning.title: Our Beginning
beginning.description: Started with a vision for luxury and our first charter experiences.

growth.title: Expanding Horizons
growth.description: Gradually expanded our offerings, focusing on quality and premium service.

destinations.title: New Routes
destinations.description: Developed unique routes around the Balearic Islands for unforgettable experiences.

today.title: Your Trusted Partner
today.description: Providing hand-picked yachts and full-service logistics.

maritime.standards: Safety equipment checks are performed annually.

business.title: Business Activity

cookies.title: Cookies Policy
cookies.metaDescription: Information about how we use cookies on our website.
cookies.intro: We use cookies to improve your experience.

whatAre.title: What are Cookies?
whatAre.description: Cookies are small text files used to store small information.

essential.title: Essential Cookies
essential.description: Required for the site to function properly.

analytical.title: Analytical Cookies
analytical.description: Used to understand how visitors interact with the website.

managing.title: Cookie Management
managing.description: You can manage your cookie preferences in your browser settings.

consent.title: Consent
consent.description: By continuing to use our website, you consent to the use of cookies.

manifest.title: Passenger Manifest
manifest.description: A complete passenger list is required.

final.title: Final Payment
final.note: Failure to pay may result in cancellation.

cancellation.title: Cancellation Policy
cancellation.description: Our cancellation terms are as follows:

weather.title: Weather Conditions
weather.description: Cancellations due to bad weather are at the captain's discretion.

responsibilities.title: Responsibilities
responsibilities.vessel: The vessel is equipped with all safety gear.
responsibilities.crew: The crew is trained in emergency procedures.
responsibilities.safety: Passengers must attend the safety briefing.

passenger.title: Passenger Conduct
passenger.respect: Must respect the vessel and crew.

liability.title: Liability
liability.description: Liability is limited to the insurance coverage.

usage.title: Vessel Usage
usage.content: The vessel must be used in a lawful manner.
